title: Comet Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Coffee shop, restaurant, and bar.  The booth and counter seating is reminiscent of an old-school diner. Extensive vegan offerings clearly marked on the menu, includes meatloaf, reuben sandwich, gyro, compact veganturkey dinner, vegan mac and cheese, vegan breakfast, vegan baked goods. Much of the menu, which consists mainly of comfort food items, can be made vegan upon request. The atmosphere is hip and laid back. Their specialty is making food from scratch. A place where omnivores and herbivores can eat together.
